Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.Line

  • public class Line
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Line()
      Creates an horizontal line in the origin.
      Line(double x, double y)
      Creates a vertical line in a particular point, in the given coordinates.
      Line(double x, double y, double pendant)
      Creates a line in the given coordinates, and a pendant.
      Line(Line l)
      Creates a new line equal than the argiment received.
      Line(Point p)
      Creates a vertical line in a particular point.
      Line(Point p, double pendant)
      Creates a Line in a particular point, with a particular pendant.
      Line(Point p, Point q)
      Creates a line that goes through 2 points.
      Line(Vector v)
      Creates a line generated by a vector

        y - the coordinate y where the line will be created
        pendant - the value of the pendant on the line (slope)

    • Method Detail

      • intersection

        public Point intersection(Line l)
        Calculates the intersection of the line calling this method and a given line as argument.
        Parameters:
        l - the line to calculate the intersection with.
        Returns:
        the intersecting point of both lines. returns null if the lines are the same or are parallels.

      • rotation

        public Line rotation(double angle)
        Creates a line, result of rotating the calling line by a given angle. The original line is not modified.
        Parameters:
        angle - The angle the line will rotate.
        Returns:
        The rotated line.

      • getB

        public double getB()
        Returns the value of the y axis where the line goes through
        Returns:
        the value of the y axis where the line goes through, returns NaN if the line is vertical;

      • getPendant

        public double getPendant()
        Returns the pendant of the line
        Returns:
        the pendant of the line in degrees

      • getSlope

        public double getSlope()
        Returns the slope of the line
        Returns:
        the slope of the line (inclination angle or angular coefficient) For example for a line with an inclination of 45º this method returns the value 1

        public int onWhichSide(Point point)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
